english.segment1: Atoning sacrifice. Keeper of this life. Hallelujah You are savior. Beginning and the end. Forgiver of my sin. By Your mercy You have saved us
english.segment2: CHORUS: Jesus You are stronger. More than any other. Hallelujah what a savior. Jesus You are higher. My soul's deepest desire. Hallelujah you are savior
english.segment3: CHORUS: You are the shepherd king. You lead us by still waters. Hallelujah You are savior. You are my only hope. Your kindness is my friend. In Your presence You restore us. You are the way the truth and the life. You are my joy and salvation. Stood in my place taking my shame. Upon your shoulder
